description:
Learn the technologies and concepts of networking in this complete course and earn your Juniper certification.

Give your career a head start in large scale Service Providers and Enterprise or simply make yourself more knowledgeable.

Basics of Networking

Juniper Devices Architecture

JNUOS Fundamentals

Design your own networks and implement Routing Protocols

Management of Juniper Devices

If you happen to visit some of the major global Service Providers like BT, NTT, Optus or even Verizon you will be surprised to see the extent of Juniper devices deployed for their core services. Juniper is one of the leading Networking equipment provider with a large product portfolio ranging from small Enterprises to large Data Centers. JNCIA-Junos (JN0-102) is the fundamental certifications that Juniper offers to new learners that will help you in realizing the working of Juniper devices and their implementation.

This course has been designed for beginner level IT Engineers. It will take you through the physical installation of the Juniper devices to the basic configurations to make network topologies for real world scenarios. This course will ensure that you understand the dreaded concepts of subnetting. You will observe actual packets as they move through the wires and make those “dots connect”. While configuring the devices you will feel as if you are doing it yourself, its that close and personal. By following this course you will not only be able achieve your JNCIA-Junos certification but it will pave the foundation for your other Juniper certification as well like JNCIP and JNCIE.
title: Juniper JNCIA-Junos (JN0-102) Complete
